document_name: Project Document Microinsurance - Final without budget.pdf
Micro-insurance Project Document-signed Cover Page Only.PDF

outputs.output_descr:
1.   Enhanced risk management capacity of the poor and vulnerable people in the project pilot sites by introducing a feasible micro-insurance products
2.  Enhanced technical capacity of insurance providers to develop and offer micro-insurance product accessible and affordable for the poor and vulnerable people
3.  Improved policy and regulatory frameworks on micro-insurance
4.  Increased public awareness and knowledge on micro-insurance

project_descr:
Capacity Development of the Micro-insurance Market Project: 
The project aims to enhance capacity of the Government and disadvantaged groups to mitigate economic and social vulnerabilities by developing and introducing market-based micro-insurance.
